column1: "description": "The table provides details regarding the access to Safe Drinking Water to Households in India. It gives the figures relating to the access to safe drinking water in Rural and Urban households (through Tap
column2: Handpump or Tubewell) for the years 1991

column1: "title": "Download XLS for Household's access to safe drinking water(External Link that opens in a new window)"
9.6 : ACCESS TO SAFE DRINKING WATER IN HOUSEHOLDS IN INDIA
Source:  Office of the Registrar General, India. Ministry of Home Affairs
a : Created in 2001. Uttarakhand, Jharkhand and Chhattisgarh for 1991 are included under Uttar Pradesh, Bihar and Madhya Pradesh respectively.
na: Not available as no census was carried out in Jammu & Kashmir during 1991.
